item.description:
The Dyke March Committee will be hosting a kick-ass raffle at Pure on Friday May 30th! You could win an ipod, a haircut, a yoga lesson, a Diesel gift certificate, and tons of other cool prizes. Come hang out with us, dance, and buy some raffle tickets. You may get lucky...with or without the raffle prizes

When: May 30, 2008
Where: PURE:FRIDAYS
75 Warrenton St
Boston MA 02116
Cost: *Only $8 before 12:00 / $10 after 12:00
must arrive at club before 1:15 to enter.
Time: Dancing between 9pm-2am. Prize Drawing held approx. between 12:30pm and 1:00am.
item.how_to_find_us: The Dyke March will have a table at Pure where you can enter our raffle drawing to bid on prizes.
item.why: Join us because you can get cool prizes and have fun.

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March

item.name: Dyke March Fundraiser Raffle at Pure Fridays
